query: SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%H:%i:%s') as time_created FROM recharges r WHERE r.amount = 300 ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%H:%i:%s') as time_created FROM recharges r WHERE r.amount = 300 ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
